item.description:
We have not been having good luck with the weather! The BriefDating event
scheduled for this Sunday (Dec. 16) is now postponed due to bad weather. It has
been rescheduled for Sunday, January 6th. All of the rest of the details are the
same and can be found on the web site.

http://www.briefdatin...

If you were signed up for the event for December, then you are
already signed up for January 6th, unless you let me know otherwise
(those who already let me know don't have to send another email).

If you couldn't make it for December, now is your chance! Hopefully,
the new date will work out better for you.!

Warm regards,
Stefan


please contact Stefan at stefan@briefdating.com
or feel free to email Vicky at: vicky.massmatch@comcast.net
with any questions!


original message: BriefDating for Western Mass!

This event is put on by someone we know, and we hear great things about it! Give it a try!

The next Speed Dating Event will take place on

January 6th, 2008
6:00-9:00pm at the Clarion Hotel in Northampton, MA

NOTE: Arrive early -- Check-in starts at 5:40pm.
Open mingling time from 6 to 6:15pm
Speed dating starts at 6:15pm

Meet many singles, quickly and easily you will have between 7 and 17 dates in one fun evening.


Get a sense if you "click" in a few minutes
Each brief date is just 7 minutes.


Safe and no pressure
You don't ask each other out. You just mark on your Dating Card if you like the person. Contact information is only sent when there is a two-way match.



For more details: www.briefdating.com

HOW BriefDating Works: http://www.briefdatin...

Click here to sign up:
http://www.briefdatin...

please contact Stefan at stefan@briefdating.com or me with any questions!

group.name: The Western Mass Singles Meetup Group

item.name: Speed Dating Event! Rescheduled date due to snow -- 1/6
